r you and your family.

I'll consider this whole thing closed, no worries.

n early due to the fact that I got laid off this morning and just went back=
 to work after spine surgery 3 months ago..I'm not supposed to work from 9-=
12 months but gave it a shot,and only having to do that cause my wife was d=
iagnosed with stage 3 cancer....You where on the recieving end of what ever=
 I thought you said...franks a friend of mine and I love the guy...So if yo=
u feel threatened do what you gotta due but please dont threaten me ok...Pe=
ace and love and a cold beer...cheers

To=

Here's what you =
said:

"Get off Franks back...Or I'll find you and you dont want that...get=
 with it or GET LOST...Thats my opion,let me know Frank and I'll take a roa=
d trip.I got laid off today and I'm in the mood to screw something or someo=
ne up !!!!!"

Mr Wegrzyn. did you mean that threat? I am considering filing=
 a police report, but I am willing to give you a chance to reexplain what y=
ou meant, or take it back, since as you said, you did get laid off and all.=

 I also don't understand the vehemence of the comments to me.=C2=A0=C2=A0 A=

ondone attacking people's beliefs, much less attacking them personally (as =
unfortunately people here are attacking me now).
